desc: Pond Pro Baits is the home of the Scorn and Sqworms everyone has been talking about. Cutting edge design allows you to catch more and use less with virtually indestructible soft plastic fishing lures. Now you can use scorn and sqworms on protected water as a safe alternative to live bait, scented, or flavored lures

layout.text: For Over A Decade The Pond Pro Team Has Worked To Bring You These Exciting New Baits
